concept.title: About Classification Data Files
concept.shortdesc: The importer lets you bulk-upload classifications data to analytics reporting in a file. The import requires a specific file format for successful data uploads.

conbody.p: To help you create valid data files, you can download a template file that provides a file structure into which you can paste the classifications data. For more information, see .

See
for information about uploading data using numeric 2 classifications.
